rule.name: EMS_EMSApproveDetails

You have entered " & len(ri!record.totalExperience) & " characters." ) ), if( ri!readOnly, #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_textField"( label: "Status", labelPosition: "ADJACENT", value: ri!record.EMS_status.value, readOnly: true ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_dropdownField"( label: "Status", labelPosition: "ABOVE", placeholderLabel: "--- Select a Value ---", choiceLabels: local!EMS_statusOptions.value, choiceValues: local!EMS_statusOptions, required: not(ri!readOnly), value: ri!record.EMS_status, saveInto: ri!record.EMS_status ) ), if( ri!creating, {}, { #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_linkField"( label: "Created By", labelPosition: if(ri!readOnly, "ADJACENT", "ABOVE"), links: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_userRecordLink"( label: #"97597486-ded5-4b50-a2f8-f297f610d000_FORMATNAME"(ri!record.createdBy), user: ri!record.createdBy ) ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_textField"( label: "Created On", labelPosition: if(ri!readOnly, "ADJACENT", "ABOVE"), value: #"_a-0001dda0-2f73-8000-aae2-01ef9001ef90_16226"(ri!record.createdOn), readOnly: true ) } ) }, secondColumnContents: { #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_textField"( label: "Email", labelPosition: if(ri!readOnly, "ADJACENT", "ABOVE"), required: not(ri!readOnly), value: ri!record.email, saveInto: ri!record.email, readOnly: ri!readOnly, validations: if( len(ri!record.email) <= 200, "", "Value may not be longer than 200 characters. You have entered " & len(ri!record.email) & " characters." ) ), if( ri!readOnly, #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_textField"( label: "Department", labelPosition: "ADJACENT", value: ri!record.EMS_department.value,
